content: @Brian Brock a while ago I started https://github.com/gdcc/dvcli for very similar reasons - I wanted a CLI interface to /api/admin and potentially all the other common user tasks around uploading etc, but didn't get very far... We recently discussed if it would make sense to merge not only easyDataverse, but also have dvcli as a part of pyDataverse. Kinda make it a one-stop shop. I would love to hear your take on this.
I need to look more carefully at dvcli. I'll probably have time Thursday or Friday, and can catch up then.
Would the scope of dvcli also include the community? For example, it could list known installations. Or maybe it could even list known people. Open pull requests. Etc, etc.
